name: The_Cactus_Blossoms
text:
The Cactus Blossoms
 The Cactus Blossoms were a music group.
Around 2016, the Cactus Blossoms played at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington, performing "Mississippi."
Behind the scenes
The Cactus Blossoms is an American country-blues duo band originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota, consisting of brothers Jack Torrey and Page Burkum. Their performance for Twin Peaks was used as the end credits backdrop for Part 3. Also appearing with the group were Joel Paterson, Beau Sample, and Alex Hall.
